property.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

label.value: Processing of the data: there is one flowfile per client and if a client is no longer active, the flowfile will disappear when trying to send a message to the client. It is now busy waiting I think it is smarter to implement this in a different way.
Data Generation : We have the actual counts per machine already in HBase, thus we can fetch the information from there, I made this flow just for having some data to be generated...
